meanings.sent1: I love the taste of calamata olives in my salad.
meanings.sent2: The calamata olive added a rich flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The calamata olive rolled off the plate and onto the floor, causing a little olive chaos.
meanings.sent4: The calamata olive stood out in the mix of regular olives like a jewel in a sea of stones.
meanings.sent5: The deep purple color of the calamata olive made it easy to spot among the green olives.

meanings.sent1: The calamata tree in our garden produces the most delicious olives.
meanings.sent2: Farmers in the region take great care of their calamata trees to ensure a good harvest.
meanings.sent3: The calamata tree swayed gently in the breeze, as if whispering secrets to the other trees.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the calamata tree reached towards the sky like outstretched arms, offering its fruits to the sun.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the calamata tree rustled softly, creating a soothing melody in the orchard.

meanings.definition: A region in Greece known for its olives
meanings.sent1: Tourists flock to Calamata to taste the famous olives grown in the region.
meanings.sent2: The olive groves in Calamata stretch as far as the eye can see.
meanings.sent3: In Calamata, even the air smells like olives, creating a unique atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The hills of Calamata are adorned with olive trees like a green blanket covering the land.
meanings.sent5: The sunset in Calamata painted the sky with hues of purple and gold, reflecting the colors of the olives grown there.
